intro: Ourisia pallens, commonly known as the slender ourisia, is a flowering plant native to South America. It belongs to the family Primulaceae and is characterized by its low-growing, mat-forming habit. The plant features small, tubular flowers that are typically pale yellow or greenish in color. Its leaves are opposite and lance-shaped, often covered in fine hairs. It thrives in moist, shaded environments and is often found in mountainous regions.
